segments.text: you are dressed to kill . You look gorgeous , Alexander .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks . This is my power suit . I have a dinner date tonight .

segments.text: how did you meet each other ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she's a friend of Amy . We met at Amy's birthday party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . I hope it pans out . Cross your fingers , Lily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure it will . Oh , no , it's seven fifteen already . I'm going to be late for my date .

segments.text: oh ... so you buried the hatchet with Steven ?

segments.text: absolutely not ! He's a cheater . I will never talk to him again . I'm over with him . He's history !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: then who will you meet tonight ?

segments.text: a guy I met on the internet three month ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: really ? Are you sure this is a good idea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: please don't be so fussy ! I didn't just meet him yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but remember to meet in a public place and don't give out your personal information .
